name: Messagebox.setNotify
description: Set notification status for a user

inputs.notes: Yes or No are valid values. Used to send corporate broadcast messages
Name of this notification entry (e.g. my-notification, mynotification, my.notification)
Order of this entry, sequence number. Set the order in which to notify the user.
Used when renaming the notify entry
Frequency in hours how often will receive notification
Options inlucde 'A' for Active, 'I' for Inactive, 'D' for Delete
'Yes' or 'No'. This will be the end of notifications when a notification is sent to this notification entry.
